Html:
Appreciate all the work to make this awesome tool.

A couple 'nice to have'  changes to the rawr:bear and rawr:cat models

1)  For the cat model,  it'd be nice to be able have an option to ignore the hit cap, when looking at possible upgrades.
2)  Similarly,  For the bear model, it'd be nice to be able to have an option to ignore the Crit Cap and maybe even the armor cap.

Those features have been suggested before, than the desires behind them have been solved in Rawr b14. Check out the Build Upgrades List feature, which should remove the need for any sort of 'ignore X cap' toggles.
